channel.description: Recent content in research on Spatial Group

item.title: Seeking a Research Fellow in Indigenous Engineering Mapping!
item.description: We are growing! Join us for a fascinating research journey into the history of Indigenous Engineering in Australia.

item.title: Quick summary of Semester 1, 2019 (apologies for slow updates)
item.description: The intense first semester is now over for me. I had a great time, interacting with amazing masters students of Spatial Databases and of Spatial Information Programming, and introducing a new generation of students to GIS in the Applications of GIS course.
